scripts.build: npm run build-ES5 && npm run build-ES6 && npm run build-admin
scripts.build-admin: npm run reset-tmp && cat src/source.ts src/admin.ts > src/tmp/1.ts && tsc src/tmp/1.ts src/globals.d.ts -t ES2016 --outFile src/tmp/2.js && cat src/metadata.ts src/tmp/2.js > dist/admin.user.js && npm run rm-tmp
scripts.build-ES6: npm run reset-tmp && cat src/source.ts src/notAdmin.ts > src/tmp/1.ts && tsc src/tmp/1.ts src/globals.d.ts -t ES2016 --outFile src/tmp/2.js && cat src/metadata.ts src/tmp/2.js > dist/skribbler.user.js && npm run rm-tmp
scripts.build-ES5-tidy: npm run reset-tmp && cat src/source.ts src/notAdmin.ts > src/tmp/1.ts && tsc src/tmp/1.ts src/globals.d.ts -t ES5 --outFile src/tmp/2.js && cat src/metadata.ts src/tmp/2.js > dist/ES5.user.js && npm run rm-tmp
scripts.build-ES5: npm run reset-tmp && cat src/source.ts src/notAdmin.ts > src/tmp/1.ts && tsc src/tmp/1.ts src/globals.d.ts -t ES5 --outFile src/tmp/2.js && uglifyjs src/tmp/2.js -o src/tmp/2.js --compress --mangle --toplevel && npm run prepend-message && cat src/metadata.ts src/tmp/3.js > dist/ES5.user.js && npm run rm-tmp
